query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS complianceAlertRules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  isActive TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  -- Monitoring configuration
  monitoredTable VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  monitoredFields JSON,
  -- Alert conditions
  conditionType ENUM('field_change', 'threshold', 'pattern', 'missing_data') NOT NULL,
  conditionConfig JSON NOT NULL,
  -- Severity and escalation
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  escalationPath JSON,
  escalationDelay INT DEFAULT 3600,
  -- Notification settings
  notifyInApp TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notifyEmail TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notifyWebhook TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  webhookUrl VARCHAR(1000),
  -- Metadata
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX userId_idx (userId),
  INDEX isActive_idx (isActive),
  INDEX severity_idx (severity)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3HwZw1vuDqLodBY.root --database hjcHA4SjAwhM6aP28vcAkH --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS complianceAlertRules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  isActive TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  -- Monitoring configuration
  monitoredTable VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  monitoredFields JSON,
  -- Alert conditions
  conditionType ENUM('field_change', 'threshold', 'pattern', 'missing_data') NOT NULL,
  conditionConfig JSON NOT NULL,
  -- Severity and escalation
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'medium',
  escalationPath JSON,
  escalationDelay INT DEFAULT 3600,
  -- Notification settings
  notifyInApp TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notifyEmail TINYINT DEFAULT 1,
  notifyWebhook TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  webhookUrl VARCHAR(1000),
  -- Metadata
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX userId_idx (userId),
  INDEX isActive_idx (isActive),
  INDEX severity_idx (severity)
)
